feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
